channel.title: Delta Glitch? [help]
channel.description:
okay, theres this weird thing on my server, i have no idea wat causes it, i've searched all the files to look for it, and still nothing
heres the weird error/exception/glitch
[code]Connection from 98.64.51.240:50985 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8984) at client.run(client.java:17350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (98.64.51.240) Connection from 1Cust1205.an3.rdu6.da.uu.net:1880 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8984) at client.run(client.java:17350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (1Cust1205.an3.rdu6.da.uu.net) Connection from ip72-200-127-198.tc.ph.cox.net:1307 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8984) at client.run(client.java:17350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (ip72-200-127-198.tc.ph.cox.net) Connection from 78-62-125-7.static.zebra.lt:2455 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8984) at client.run(client.java:17350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (78-62-125-7.static.zebra.lt) Connection from 78-62-125-7.static.zebra.lt:2456 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8984) at client.run(client.java:17350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (78-62-125-7.static.zebra.lt)[/code]
help please

item.title: Delta Glitch? [help]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

hey silab its me from r-s lol…
try this…
difficulty 4/10
classes modified server.java,client.java
first step
go to your server class
find

public void run() {and replace it with this

[code]

public void run() {
    // setup the listener
    try {
        shutdownClientHandler = false;
        clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1,
                null);
        misc.println("SERVERNAME");
        while (true) {
            try {
                java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
                s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
                String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
                if ( /*
                 * connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") ||
                 * connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")
                 */true) {
                    if (connectingHost.contains("*")) {
                        misc.println("Checking Server Status...");
                        s.close();
                    } else {
                        connections.add(connectingHost);
                        if (limitcount(connectingHost) > 2) {
                            s.close();
                        }
                        if (checkHost(connectingHost)) {
                            //misc.println("Connection from "
                                    //+ connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());
                        playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);
                        } else {
                            //misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "
                                    //+ connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());
                            s.close();
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "
                            + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());
                    s.close();
                }
                if ((delayUpdate > 0)
                        && (System.currentTimeMillis() > delayUpdate)) {
                    delay = 50;
                    delayUpdate = 0;
                }
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                logError(e.getMessage());
            }
        }[/code]DONT FORGET TO EDIT SERVERNAME INTO YOUR SERVER's NAME

NEXT FIND

} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {AND
UNDER the last

[code]}/code]
add this

public int limitcount(String host) { int numz = 0; for (String h : connections) { if (host.equals(h)) { numz++; } return numz; } return numz; } } PART TWO
open your client class
and search for

if (mySock == null) {ull see something like this

if (mySock == null) { return; } // already shutdown try { misc.println("ClientHandler: Client " + playerName + " disconnected (" + connectedFrom + ")"); disconnected = true; if (saveNeeded) savegame(true); if (in != null) { in.close(); } if (out != null) { out.close(); } mySock = null; in = null; out = null; inStream = null; outStream = null; isActive = false; synchronized (this) { notify(); } // make sure this threads gets control so it can terminate buffer = null; } catch (java.io.IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } super.destruct(); } replace that whole thing with this

if (mySock == null) { return; } // already shutdown try { misc.println("ClientHandler: Client " + playerName + " disconnected (" + connectedFrom + ")"); disconnected = true; if (saveNeeded) savegame(true); if (in != null) { in.close(); } if (out != null) { out.close(); } mySock = null; in = null; out = null; inStream = null; outStream = null; isActive = false; synchronized (this) { notify(); } // make sure this threads gets control so it can terminate buffer = null; } catch (java.io.IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } super.destruct(); } SAVE AND COMPILE
IF YOUR SERVER IS ALREADY ON RESTART IT
POST FOR ERRORS OR IF U NEED HELp!
YOUR WELCOME -atrix676

WHAT IT DOES IT

ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (92.1.228.145) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (92.1.228.145) BANNING HOST 92.1.228.145 (flooding)AND U WONT SEE BANNING HOST 92.1.228.145 (flooding)
MASS CLICKING
causing socket closed or wut ever
rep me if it worked :D[/code]

Read full topic
